Container.Name: ffmpeg-nvidia
Container.Overview:
Dockerized ffmpeg with nvidia HW support.
How to run: docker exec -i ffmpeg ffmpeg -i input.avi -c:v h264_nvenc -b:v 64k -bufsize 64k output.avi
Container.Description:
Dockerized ffmpeg with nvidia HW support.
How to run: docker exec -i ffmpeg-nvidia ffmpeg -i input.avi -c:v h264_nvenc -b:v 64k -bufsize 64k output.avi
